Row.Text: Allows airlifts to or from this city. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Air Units. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Increases Air Unit capacity of the city from 6 to 10.[ENDCOLOR] 50% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works +50%.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Allows airlifts to or from this city. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Air Units. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Increases Air Unit capacity of the city from 6 to 10.[ENDCOLOR] 50% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works +50%.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Allows airlifts to or from this city. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Air Units. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Increases Air Unit capacity of the city from 6 to 10.[ENDCOLOR] 50% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works +50%.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Allows airlifts to or from this city. +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Air Units. [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Increases Air Unit capacity of the city from 6 to 10.[ENDCOLOR] 50% of the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from World Wonders, Natural Wonders, and Improvements (Landmarks, Moai, Chateau) is added to the [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output of the city. [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output from Great Works +50%.

The versatile Airport is an excellent choice for both civilizations that are trying to improve their [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output and those that need to use airlift capabilities to shuttle units to distant cities. Airport also gives a Production boost towards Air Units and increases the Air Unit capacity of the City, allowing your Civilization to dominate the skies more effectively.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The versatile Airport is an excellent choice for both civilizations that are trying to improve their [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism output and those that need to use airlift capabilities to shuttle units to distant cities. Airport also gives a Production boost towards Air Units and increases the Air Unit capacity of the City, allowing your Civilization to dominate the skies more effectively.
